bug.author: TOsmanov
bug.summary: CVAT new UI: The block with information about the object does not disappear if the object is locked
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
If an object is blocked, a block with information about the object appears when you hover and disappears when you hover over another object. <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
If an object is locked, a block with information about the object appears when you hover over it but does not disappear when you hover over another object. Now showing a block with information at a locked object can be called accidentally and a block with information will interfere. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54434686/79838351-86170500-83bb-11ea-98b7-f45cc41f9ad4.gif></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Lock object Place the cursor on the object Information block appears Hover over another object The block with information about the object does not disappear
<denchmark-h:h3>Context</denchmark-h>
In workspace Setting "Always show object details" - disabled

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TOsmanov>@TOsmanov</denchmark-link> , please confirm that the problem was resolved.
